name: Have you got the balls to play this game?
name_original: Have you got the balls to play this game?
description:
Pickup balls and shoot them at enemies. Speedrun the game. Defeat the final Buff Kangaroo boss to win.

Controls

  • "WASD" or "Arrow Keys" to Move
  • "E" to Melee
  • "Space" to Shoot Balls

Asset Creation

  • Art - Mostly me and Dall-e Mini AI
  • Coding - Me
  • Sound Effects - Freesound
  • Music - Freesound
